name: Kumarika Hair Oil Hair Fall Control
description: Kumarika Hair Fall Control Nourishing Hair Oil specifically designed with a blend of 5 time-tested ingredients that have proven to nourish your scalp and hair and fight against hair fall. The  100% natural extracts of Gotukola, Amla, Aloe Vera & Mukunewwna is mixed with virgin coconut oil to easily penetrate through your hair roots and strengthen the hair making it luscious. It is light-weight and non-sticky. How to use: Apply an adequate amount of oil to your hair from root to tip. Massage the scalp gently from your fingertips. Can be used daily. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
